q: The Congressional Steel Caucus of lawmakers from steel-making states urged Barack Obama to tell Hu Jintao that "American patience for its unfair and illegal trade practices, and its exploitative and anti-competitive policies, has run out." There's increasing frustration, particularly on the exchange rate issue, with the pace at which the Chinese have advanced, Steve Ballmer Dunaway, an international economics expert at the Council on Foreign Relations, told reporters.
